plot: As their school bus teeters over the edge of a cliff, the boys recall past memories.

When the kids' school bus crashes and ends up hanging off the edge of a cliff, Miss Crabtree tells everyone to stay in the bus while she goes to get help. While they wait, the kids tell stories about their past adventures, although their versions don't quite match up with what actually happened. Meanwhile, Miss Crabtree has little success trying to get anyone to listen to her demands for help.—Jean-Marc Rocher <rocher@fiberbit.net>
